WorkshopItemInfo.Name: cs_backalley (1.6)
WorkshopItemInfo.Description:
The 1.6 version of cs_backalley, ported to [i]Holdfast: Nations at War[/i]!
cs_backalley was one of the first hostage rescue maps, first appearing in the 2000 beta and subsequently re-appearing in [i]1.6[/i], and [i]Condition Zero[/i]. A remastered version was briefly added to [i]Global Offensive[/i] as part of Operation Vanguard.
Supports Army Battlefield, Army Assault Melee Arena. This map is best suited to smaller populations, the recommended configs available in this repository: https://github.com/AgentNo/holdfast-server-configs . Sappers will be unable to build on this map due to the lack of terrain.
This map also features working hostage objectives. To capture a hostage, play as CT and hold 'E' on the objective.
[url=https://www.models-resource.com/pc_computer/counterstrike16/model/28150/]cs_backalley model courtesy of ViGamezBoy.[/url]
Part of the 87th's Counter-Strike: Holdfast Offensive collection. Join us today - https://discord.gg/dakvCACDSF
